short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Marks the liked jobs on upwork.com job feed, by giving them a light green background color.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension detects the listings that you liked, and it paints them with a nice light green background color. This way, when you visit the page later and scroll through the listings, you'll easily see the last listing that you liked.
